title: Arcane Bombardment

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bombard someone each night, dealing a Basic attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not change your target after choosing it.
- Whenever you choose a target for bombardment, you will copy one other ability that has resolved at any point during the game. Then, you may use all abilities copied with this attribute. You can't use those abilities normally.
- Roleblock and redirect immune.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
